application.doc: Exporting the transaction logging data file or rollover transaction logging data file for a component

param.name: component_id
param.doc: ID of the transaction logging component.

param.name: file_id
param.doc: The relative path to which the transaction logging data file or rollover transaction logging data file is exported.

param.name: export
param.doc: An indication that this operation is to retrieve the entire file not just a snippet. This parameter is required

method.name: GET
method.id: Exporting the transaction logging data file or rollover transaction logging data file for a component
method.doc: To complete the operation with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command and include the export parameter on the Reverse Proxy transaction logging data files resource URI. The export parameter is what differentiates the retrieve operation and the export operation. The difference is that the export response is the text of the certificate request, while the retrieve response is the certificate request text in JSON format.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

response.doc:
HTTP response code and the transaction log file.
200 ok
The transaction log text

param.name: Content-Type:application/octet-stream; charset=UTF-8
param.doc: The response is a stream of text.
